ITN INFORM: INterFaces in Opto-electRonic Thin Film Multilayer Devices. Techniques like materials chemistry, polymer processing, ultra-fast probes, device physics & technology and large-area processing to collectively target the critical issues that stifle progress of the promising electronics platform.
